name: Eggplant Casserole 1
ingredients: 1 med. eggplant, cut in cubes and parboiled
sharp cheese, cut into small pieces
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained, optional
instructions: Cover bottom with bread crumbs, then add eggplant, celery, bell pepper, onions, sausage and tomatoes.
Cover and bake at 350 for 45 min.
Return to over 3-4 minutes until cheese melts.
